datasheets.name: Knight Abominant
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: diabolus heavy stubber; volkite combustor; balemace; electroscourge.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Vortex Terrors (Psychic)
other.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

other.name: Warp Storms (Psychic)
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 9" of this model: on a 3+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Desecrator
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: desecrator laser destructor; diabolus heavy stubber; reaper chainsword.
wargear: This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 warpstrike claw.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Obsessive Ruthlessness
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack against a Monster or Vehicle unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

other.name: Taskmaster (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 9" of this model, each time that War Dog model makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Despoiler
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: daemonbreath meltagun; reaper chainsword; titanic feet; warpstrike claw.
wargear: This model’s daemonbreath meltagun can be replaced with 1 diabolus heavy stubber.

This model’s reaper chainsword can be replaced with 1 of the following: ◦ 1 daemonbreath thermal cannon ◦  1 despoiler gatling cannon and 1 heavy darkflamer ◦  1 despoiler battle cannon and 1 diabolus heavy stubber

This model’s warpstrike claw can be replaced with 1 of the following: ◦ 1 daemonbreath thermal cannon ◦  1 despoiler gatling cannon and 1 heavy darkflamer ◦  1 despoiler battle cannon and 1 diabolus heavy stubber
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 havoc missile pod ◦ 1 ruinspear rocket pod ◦ 1 hellstorm autocannons

other.name: Dread Dominion (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog is within 9" of this model, each time that War Dog takes a Battle-shock test, add 1 to that test.

other.name: Seething Hatred
other.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot or fight, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving those attacks.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Rampager
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: diabolus heavy stubber; reaper chainsword; warpstrike claw.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Bloodlust
other.description: Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, its melee weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, once per battle, this model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

other.name: Frenzied Rampage (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 9" of this model, each time that War Dog model makes a melee attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Knight Tyrant
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: brimstone volcano lance; ectoplasma decimator; 2 gheiststrike missile launchers; 2 twin daemonbreath meltaguns; twin desecrator cannon; titanic feet.
wargear: This model’s brimstone volcano lance and ectoplasma decimator can be replaced with 1 darkflame cannon and 1 warpshock harpoon.
This model’s 2 gheiststrike missile launchers and twin desecrator cannon can be replaced with 1 gheiststrike missile launcher and 2 twin desecrator cannons.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Infernal Aegis (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly War Dog model is within 6" of this model, that War Dog model has the Benefit of Cover.

other.name: Bastion of Corruption
other.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: War Dog Brigand
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: avenger chaincannon; daemonbreath spear; diabolus heavy stubber; armoured feet.
wargear: This model’s diabolus heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 havoc multi-launcher.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Brigand
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: War Dog Executioner
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: diabolus heavy stubber; 2 War Dog autocannons; armoured feet.
wargear: This model’s diabolus heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 daemonbreath meltagun.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Executioner
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a unit Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: War Dog Huntsman
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: daemonbreath spear; diabolus heavy stubber; reaper chaintalon.
wargear: This model’s diabolus heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 daemonbreath meltagun.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Huntsman
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack against a Monster or Vehicle unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1 and re-roll a Damage roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: War Dog Karnivore
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: diabolus heavy stubber; reaper chaintalon; slaughterclaw.
wargear: This model’s diabolus heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 havoc multi-launcher.

invul.info: * This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

other.name: Karnivore
other.description: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this model.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: War Dog Stalker
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: avenger chaincannon; diabolus heavy stubber; slaughterclaw.
wargear: This model’s avenger chaincannon can be replaced with 1 daemonbreath spear.
This model’s diabolus heavy stubber can be replaced with 1 havoc multi-launcher.
This model’s slaughterclaw can be replaced with 1 reaper chaintalon.

other.name: Stalker
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, if there are no other units from your opponent’s army within 6" of that target, add 1 to the Wound roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
